about_the_game:
Step into an Epic Multiplayer Strategy Adventure

Immerse yourself in a world woven with myths and legends. Dive into this deep, turn-based tactics game, where you can select your favorite heroes from an expansive roster that includes iconic figures like dragons, mermaids, werewolves, princesses, Santa Claus, and many more! Challenge your friends, master competitive multiplayer, explore a captivating story mode, and build your own scenarios in the level editor. With endless ways to play, make your mark and share your unique story with the world.

Engage in Intense PvP Tactics

Build a team of nine characters and compete against friends to see who claims victory. Each game spans 20 turns, where strategic choices and character selection determine the outcome. Choose from 45 unique characters, including legendary creatures and mythical icons. Experiment with different strategies and find the team composition that best suits your play style.

Your Moves, Your Outcome

Forget frustrating hit percentages—your attacks are guaranteed to land, letting you focus on planning each turn with precision. Move five characters each turn, creating nearly limitless possibilities with each game. Every decision counts, every move matters, making each match uniquely thrilling and unpredictable.

Simple to Pick Up, Challenging to Master

With 45 distinct characters featuring intuitive abilities, you’ll quickly learn the basics while discovering incredible strategic depth. Characters like Prince Charming can charm foes to his side, Hercules hurls enemies across the field, and Treants create a forest army. No menu clutter, no RNG—just pure strategy and seamless gameplay. With over a million character combinations, dive in to find synergies that match your style.

Express Your Creativity with the Level Editor

Unleash your creativity in an immersive level editor, designed for crafting your own tactical RPG stories. Create thrilling scenarios, write engaging dialogue, and bring your imaginative worlds to life. Share your creations with others, adding your voice to this dynamic game universe.

Try the Demo

Experience a taste of the adventure with our demo! Play with 25 of the available characters and explore 12 exciting stories in story mode. Enjoy online multiplayer and get creative in the level editor to dive deep into what this world has to offer.

Play with Anyone, Anywhere

Experience both local and online multiplayer for ultimate flexibility. Play on your computer at home, or take the action on the go with Steam Deck. Connect with friends around the world or enjoy a fun couch co-op session on game night.

Join a New Era of Turn-Based Tactics

Revolutionize the way you play multiplayer tactical games—wishlist today and be part of the journey!
